name: get_weather_forcast
description: Fetches weather forecast for a given city using the WeatherAPI.

q.description: Query parameter for location. It could be Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree), location name, postal code, METAR code, IATA code, or IP address.

dt.description: Restrict date output (optional). The date format should be yyyy-MM-dd. Default is None.

days.description: Number of days of forecast required, ranging from 1 to 3. Default is 1.

include_astro.description: Whether to include astronomical data such as sunrise, sunset, moonrise, etc. Default is False.

include_hour_forecast.description: Whether to include hour-by-hour weather forecast information. Default is False.
